Pore/Structural Features.Pore Size: 29 Å and 34 Å (pore diameters), 12 Å and 16 Å (pore apertures), 1.5 nm (new narrow pore after PDA encapsulation)

Other Information.Additional Info: Rejection rate is 100% for 3 nm platinum nanoparticles.
Rejection rate is 100% for 13 nm gold nanoparticles.

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Adsorption followed by size exclusion due to filter cake formation

Other Information.Additional Info: Rejection rate is 94.5% at 128 mM concentration.

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Adsorption followed by size exclusion due to filter cake formation

Other Information.Additional Info: Rejection rate is 99.5% at 240 mM concentration.
Adsorption capacity of SNF/PDA3101(22) WTM is 13.18 mg/g.
Adsorption capacity of SNF/PDA3101(22) WTM is 13.6 mg/g.
Adsorption capacity of SNF/PDA3101(22) WTM is 15.7 mg/g.

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale combined with adsorption by PDA functional groups

Experimental Validation.Method: Vacuum filtration experiments, dye rejection tests, heavy metal ion adsorption tests, ICP-OES analysis
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Water flux: 3249 L h^-1 m^-2 bar^-1 for 1-mm thick membrane; Rejection rates >94.5% for small molecule dyes; Adsorption capacities up to 35 mg/g for arsenic ions.

Other Information.Additional Info: The membrane integrates size exclusion and adsorption capabilities, achieving high removal efficiency for nanoparticles, small-molecule dyes, heavy metals, and radioactive elements.
